item.title: Israeli strikes in southern, central Gaza kill more than 60 Palestinians, including in 'safe zone' - The Associated Press
item.description:
1. Israeli strikes in southern, central Gaza kill more than 60 Palestinians, including in 'safe zone'  The Associated Press
  2. Israel pounds central Gaza, sends tanks into north of Rafah  Reuters
  3. Israel’s war on Gaza live: At least 81 killed in 24 hours of Israeli raids  Al Jazeera English
  4. IDF increasingly certain Deif died in strike, says Hamas fighters in ‘survival mode’  The Times of Israel
  5. Gazans endure deadly weekend of Israeli strikes as UN chief laments ‘incomprehensible and inexcusable’ destruction  CNN
